name: ICScannerFunctionalUnitState
desc: Flags to indicate the state of the scanner functional unit.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: A flag indicating that the functional unit is ready for operation.

items.name: case overviewScanInProgress
items.desc: A flag indicating that the functional unit is performing an overview scan.

items.name: case scanInProgress
items.desc: A flag indicating that the functional unit is performing a scan.
